channel.title: Comments on: On-line add-node with MCM; a more complex example
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../on-line-add-node-with-mcm-a-more-complex-example-2/index.html#comment-184929">vishnu</a>.
Hi Vishnu,
obvious question but did you have other schema changes being applied at the time?
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to vishnu.

Hi Vishnu,

obvious question but did you have other schema changes being applied at the time?

Andrew.

item.title: By: vishnu
item.dc:creator: vishnu
item.description:
hi
can you shed some light as to how an online alter(reorg partitions) works in ndb
i was trying it out yesterday in 7.3.5 and got the ERROR 1297 (HY000): Got temporary error 701 'System busy with other schema operation' from NDBCLUSTER error.
are there any parameteres i need to tune for online alters in specific ?
thanks,
with regards, ch Vishnu
item.content:encoded:
hi

can you shed some light as to how an online alter(reorg partitions) works in ndb

i was trying it out yesterday in 7.3.5 and got the
ERROR 1297 (HY000): Got temporary error 701 ‘System busy with other schema operation’ from NDBCLUSTER error.

are there any parameteres i need to tune for online alters in specific ?

thanks,

with regards,
ch Vishnu
